title: New X-Men: Childhood's End, Vol. 2: Crusade
description: If you thought Volume 1 was intense, buckle up.The dire consequences of recent actions have put the students of the Xavier Institute in their most dangerous situation yet. Reverend Stryker has replaced his crucifixes and prayers with bullets and hand grenades. Can the kids survive his brand of conversion? Collecting: New X-Men 24-27
author: Craig Kyle
